# WireGuard Secure VPN Tunnel

Setup and configuration has been tested on following OS with version:

  • Ubuntu 18.04

# Prerequisites

# Setup WireGuard

$ sudo add-apt-repository ppa:wireguard/wireguard
$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get install wireguard
